text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Association" means the Maryland State Firemen's Association.
"Fund" means the Volunteer Company Assistance Fund.

"Volunteer company" means a volunteer ambulance, fire, or rescue company:
located in the State; or
located outside the State if the company:
has been a member of the Association for at least the past 10 years; and
has a first due response area in the State.
